fitness.title: Streamline your fitness journey
fitness.description: We're revolutionizing online fitness coaching by integrating diverse digital tools into one efficient platform.

wellness.title: Elevate Your Wellness Experience
wellness.description: Embark on a transformative fitness journey with FitFusion, where cutting-edge technology meets personalized coaching for a healthier you.

energize.title: Sync Your Life, Energize Your Body
energize.description: VitaSync is your all-in-one hub for seamless fitness integration. Unleash the power of technology and personalized guidance to achieve your health and wellness goals.

LandingPage.title: Manage your entire community in a single system

plans.title: Plans, timeline and ideas
plans.description: We offer a variety of plans to suit your needs. Choose the one that's right for you.

first.title: All in one
first.description: Nutrition tracking, progress tracking, workout planning all in one place

second.title: Clean database
second.description: We provide clean and reliable database, which can also be expandable with your own foods, recipes and meals

third.title: Generators
third.description: Our custom made generators help you onboard clients faster by creating custom made meal plans and workouts for them

fourth.title: Membership Organisations
fourth.description: Our membership management software provides full automation of membership renewals and payments

fifth.title: National Associations
fifth.description: Our membership management software provides full automation of membership renewals and payments

sixth.title: Integration with hardware devices
sixth.description: We provide integration with hardware devices - smart watches, bands and rings

future.title: The future is heltier
future.description: The helti blog is the best place to read about the latest membership insights, trends and more.

LandingPage.subscribe: Subscribe to our newsletter & keep in touch.

IndexPage.title: next-intl example
IndexPage.description: This is a basic example that demonstrates the usage of next-intl with the Next.js App Router. Try changing the locale in the top right corner and see how the content changes.

PathnamesPage.title: Pathnames
PathnamesPage.description:
The pathnames are internationalized too.

If you're using the default language English, you'll see /en/pathnames in the browser address bar on this page.

If you change the locale to German, the URL is localized accordingly (/de/pfadnamen).

Error.title: Something went wrong!
Error.description:
We've unfortunately encountered an error.

You can try to reload the page you were visiting.

NotFoundPage.title: Page not found
NotFoundPage.description: Please double-check the browser address bar or use the navigation to go to a known page.

docs.title: Docs
docs.description: Learn more about next-intl in the official docs.

source.title: Source code
source.description: Browse the source code of this example on GitHub.
